ygData.subject: Re: South Karana Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: That s probably the quest that went along with the story line about the plague in the Karanas, last year.  Farmers couldn t grow bread and were starving, etc.
ygData.messageBody:
That's probably the quest that went along with the story line about
the plague in the Karanas, last year. Farmers couldn't grow bread
and were starving, etc. . . Someone correct me if I'm wrong, but when
they fixed the plague, the quest went away, I think.

Kharlisht

--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., zephlarus <no_reply@y...> wrote:
> I have heard about a quest that is given by a centuar, in the same
> hut as the crafter armor guys, that you have to take a bag of bread
> loafs to an Innkeeper in Kelethin. I went to SK and tried to find
> him, I went to the centuar camp and found the crafted armor guys,
but
> this other guy was no where to be found. Has anyone ever heard
> of/done this quest? Was it removed? Did it ever exist?
